entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Update references to helix queues that are going to be removed at end of the month #65033
  • System.Text.Tests.EncodingExtensionsTests.Convert_Encoder_ReadOnlySpan_IBufferWriter failing in runtime-extra-platforms #65026
  • JIT Optimization: Merge multiple `inc` into one `add` #65025
  • System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.StreamTests_Async.HandleCollectionsAsync failing in runtime-extra-platforms #65021
  • System.Text.Json.Tests.Utf8JsonWriterTests.WriteNumbers failing in runtime-extra-platforms #65019
  • Application fails to start using System.Runtime.Experimental 6.0.1 with .NET 6.0.2 #65018
  • CoreCLR's dbgshim is moving into dotnet/diagnostics repo #65017
    7.0.0
  • WasmTestOnNodeJs-System.Threading.Channels.Tests failing with 'RuntimeError: invalid index into function table' #65016
  • System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.DesignerVerb text replacement potentially erroneous #65015
    Future
  • Assembly.GetType("System.Net.Http.HttpClientHandler", false, true) does not find type but finds it when ignoreCase is set to false #65013
  • [wasm][windows] System.Threading.Channels.Tests failing with `RuntimeError: table index is out of bounds` on v8, chrome, and node. #65012
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add Regex.Enumerate(ReadOnlySpan<char>) which is allocation free #65011
    7.0.0
  • ILVerification fails unexpectedly on delegate construction #65010
  • DllImportGenerator crashes in IDE while editing GeneratedDllImport attribute #65008
    7.0.0
  • NetFramework 4.6.1 to 4.8 with System.Net.Http regression #65005
  • Add `FlagsAttribute` to `GC_ALLOC_FLAGS` #65004
  • [mono][fullaot] Calling static virtual method from a generic method leads to "Attempting to JIT" error #65002
    7.0.0
  • System.Runtime.InteropServices.Tests causing OSX queue backup from uploading dump #65000
    7.0.0
  • Open Generics mixed with Closed Generics in dependency injection #64995
    Future
  • Default trace events for .NET app performance analysis #64993
  • Some regex optimizations are conflicting with each other #64991
    7.0.0
  • Consider Removing Unity and StructureMap from DependencyInjection.ExternalContainers.Tests #64988
    7.0.0
  • profiler unit test releaseondetach SIGABRT'ing with updated C# compiler / `!!` usage #64986
    7.0.0
  • godbolt-specific improvements for crossgen #64981
  • AddRemoveFromDifferentThreads<string>.ConcurrentStack benchmark hangs on Windows ARM64 #64980
  • Bitmap constructor with IntPtr wierd behavior on linux #64978
  • Regressions from recent change in Enumerable/String #64992
  • Test failure JIT\\Regression\\JitBlue\\GitHub_35821\\GitHub_35821\\GitHub_35821.cmd #64972
    7.0.0
  • Regressions from simple forward substitution pass #64989
  • Console.CancelKeyPress is not called when SIGQUIT is received #64969
  • ThreadPoolTests.CooperativeBlockingCanCreateThreadsFaster timed out #64964
  • System.Net.NetworkInformation.Tests.PingTest.SendPingWithHostAndTimeoutAndBuffer failing on OSX #64963
  • Update the HWIntrinsics to allow removal where no side-effects exist #64962
  • [API Proposal]: make it easier to create custom Stream, TextReader, and TextWriter implementations #64958
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\X86\\Avx1\\Sqrt_ro\\Sqrt_ro.cmd #64957
  • Test failure JIT/HardwareIntrinsics/General/Vector128/Vector128_ro/Vector128_ro.sh #64956
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Use generic collections in System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter implementation instead of non-generic #17217
    Future
  • System.Net.Security.Tests failed with System.IO.IOException #52362
    Future
  • CipherSuitesPolicy constructor throws PlatformNotSupportedException on Linux with OpenSSL 1.1.1 #61891
    6.0.x
  • Consider exposing IConfiguration from IHostBuilder #1171
    Future
  • Regressions in System.Collections.Tests.Perf_BitArray #64990
  • JIT: Incorrect results for programs in win-x86 release #64904
    7.0.0
  • Control flow guard support in the JIT #59190
    7.0.0
  • System.Numerics.Vectors.Tests: Assertion failed 'intrinsicId == NI_Vector128_GetElement' #64918
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'gtOper < GT_COUNT' during 'Assertion prop' #64892
  • Assertion failed 'a != b' during 'Do value numbering' #64761
  • Copy propagation needs to propagate variables, not values #64700
    7.0.0
  • PseudoCustomAttribute.GetStructLayoutCustomAttribute returns incorrect data #12480
    7.0.0
  • Android profiling crashes Podcast app on startup #64458
    6.0.MAUI
  • Enable network tracing in dotnet core #64977
  • [MacCatalyst] System.Xml.XmlSerializer.Tests timed out #63168
  • [android][arm64] System.Net.NetworkInformation.Tests.PingTest.SendPingWithIPAddressAndBigSize throws PNSE #64798
  • Running .NET 6 Web App gives HTTP Error 500.31 - ANCM Failed to Find Native Dependencies #64974
  • DirectoryInfo.MoveTo mistakenly prevents renaming directories to case variations of themselves on Windows, macOS #63287
    7.0.0
  • PathTooLongException with MemoryMappedView{Accessor,Stream} tests on osx-arm64 release with mono runtime #64947
  • [QUIC] How to handle graceful connection shutdown #46542
    7.0.0
  • range_r work item: fail: Non-success instrumentation exit code: 101, expected: 0 #64920
  • Visual Studio 2019 is crashing when trying to load a solution with System.AccessViolationException #61200
  • "Failed to create CoreCLR, HRESULT: 0x80004005" crash when starting PowerShell 7.2 on Windows 11 #61740
  • Failed to create CoreCLR, HRESULT: 0x80004005 #63647
  • [DllImportGenerator] ignore DLLIMPORTGEN003 #64811
  • Regression in connections creation performance #61233
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix runtime-official when executed against PRs in azdo #65034
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add a new wrapper `runtime-wasm.yml` to be used from azdo #65032
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add Credscan suppressions #65030
    * NO MERGE *, area-Meta
  • Allow constant propagation of Vector.Zero. #65028
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] improve SslStream tests on misconfigured systems #65024
    area-System.Net.Security
  • update expected exception for cases when all requested TLS versions are disabled #65020
    area-System.Net.Http, test enhancement
  • Make System.Math/MathF.Truncate an intrinsic #65014
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Update Parallel.ForEachAsync.cs (2) #65009
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • [wasm] bump sdk for workload testing to 7.0.100-preview.1.22108.2 #65006
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] bump sdk for workload testing to 7.0.100-preview.2.22108.4 #65003
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #64999
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #64998
  • Add missing GC.SuppressFinalize #64997
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • NativeAOT Fix error during unwrap existing instance #64996
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [Mono] Add arm64 SIMD intrinsic for Vector64/128 Ceiling and Floor #64994
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/6.0] Console.Unix: fix missing terminal configuration on SIGINT/SIGQUIT/SGCONT. #64985
    area-System.Console
  • Compliance CVE-2021-26701 fix for a test project #64984
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Introduce DOTNET_AltJitOS #64979
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Hosting: ConfigDoesReload tests: increase timeout. #64976
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • FileSystemWatcher.Unix: use CLOEXEC when initializing an inotify instance. #64971
    area-System.IO, tenet-reliability, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Optional param fix 56251 #64970
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • improve SslStream tests on server 2022 #64968
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [mono] Decompress ICU data during iOS/tvOS app startup #64967
    area-System.Globalization
  • improve SslStream tests on misconfigured systems #64966
    area-System.Net.Security, test enhancement
  • [Mono] Add SIMD intrinsics for Vector{64, 128} on Arm64 Part I #64961
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Override DictionaryEntry.ToString to match KeyValuePair.ToString #64959
    area-System.Collections, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix long directory path test #64955
    area-System.IO
  • [tests][mobile] Enable diagnostic_tracing for iOS runtime tests #64952
  • Treat TZCNT/POPCNT/LZCNT as never negative #64951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0

Merged

  • Merge release/6.0-maui branch back into release/6.0 #64687
    Servicing-approved, new-api-needs-documentation, area-codeflow, 6.0.3
  • Fix System.Runtime reference versions and several test project names under JIT/Methodical #64839
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Enable merging of platform-variant tests #64835
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Try to fix outerloop build break #65027
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Use generic collections in System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter implementation #63315
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Another size estimate fix for `mov`s #64826
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve SSL platform detection #64923
    area-System.Net.Security, test enhancement
  • Initial roll out of !! #64720
    area-Meta
  • Change the way we build CoreCLR tests for NativeAOT #64738
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add JIT support for control-flow guard on x64 and arm64 #63763
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add `runtime-wasm` pipeline #64830
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Including FastFloat in parsing process #62301
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Update Android to r23b image #64567
    os-android, area-Infrastructure
  • Delete StructLayoutAttribute.Pack adjustment #64965
    area-System.Reflection
  • Temporarily disable core dumps when running libraries tests on macOS #65001
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Test and document decision around CFB8 padding #64949
    area-System.Security
  • JIT: more stringent interference checks in forward sub #64933
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Take into account zero-offset field sequences when propagating locals #64701
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: fix containment safety check in LowerHWIntrinsicGetElement #64960
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: fix morph's tree rethreading/recosting logic #64954
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix runtime tests on Android #64950
  • [mono] Fix is_byreflike_set on big-endian platforms #64903
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix SymbolixRegexRunner handling of "beginning" #64946
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Reduce the cost of creating a MemoryMappedFile #63790
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Improve Directory.Move and DirectoryInfo.MoveTo #63675
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Fix card marking issue #64748
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [Mono] Fix potential crash when handling image load event. #64908
    area-Tracing-mono
  • Add user-facing docs and samples for NativeAOT #64894
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Local heap optimizations on Arm64 #64481
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update branding to 5.0.15 #64642
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • NativeAOT ARM64 libraries testing #64373
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Add alignment to mapped field stream #64559
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Reflection.Metadata, 6.0.3
  • Remove spin lock from SocketAsyncEventArgs on Windows #64770
    area-System.Net.Sockets, tenet-performance
  • [release/6.0] [Mono] Fix potential crash when handling image load event. #64911
    Servicing-approved, area-Tracing-mono, 6.0.3

Updated

  • [wasm] Rationalize wasm jobs run on CI #65035
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add default method support to virtual statics #64717
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Identify OSArchitecture at run-time #60910
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Move DllImportGenerator to use DisableRuntimeMarshalling for its blittable classification #64279
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Clean up several special tests under JIT/Methodical #64837
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [tests][eventpipe] Port over Dotnet/Diagnostics to enable eventpipe tests on Android #64358
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Process.GetProcessById bugfix #64723
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Remove S.R.CS.Unsafe and Intrinsify Unsafe #64861
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Morph `Vector.Create(0)` to `Vector.Zero` #63821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Structs: Do not mark "Hidden buffer pointer" as address-exposed #64130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Match and isMatch ReadOnlySpan<char> overloads as well as Regex protected methods which expose ReadOnlySpan<char> to avoid allocations. #62509
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Repair inconsistent nullability nullability on TypeConverter (#63186) #63874
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Skip AOT of Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.dll for WASM, due to out-of-memory issues in CI #63958
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure
  • [tests][mobile] Enable diagnostic_tracing for mobile runtime tests #60879
    area-System.Diagnostics, os-android
  • Don't use Targets* helper properties in libs #64500
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [Group 2] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Options` #63767
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution
  • Copy propagation tweaking #64378
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Use generic math in System.Numerics.Vectors (#60365) #60905
    area-System.Numerics, blocked, community-contribution
  • Check for CodeSizeZero error before any assumptions about code existing #63239
    area-ILVerification, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Fix WebSocket tests on NodeJS #64330
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • Deduplicate several special classes of JIT/Methodical tests #64842
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Use ValueStringBuilder to fix allocations in ToString() methods of XdsDateTime and XsdDuration #64868
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Use static abstract interface methods in SymbolicRegexMatcher #63546
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [draft][wasm] InvokeJSFunctionByName alternate design #64493
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Update RateLimiter queues on cancellation #64825
    area-System.Threading
  • Implement TLS1.3 delayed client cert requests on Linux #64268
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux
  • WIP: CoreCLR runtime tests on Mono Windows x64. #64281
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [API Implementation]: DirectoryInfo.CopyTo / Directory.Copy #62375
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Consolidate _handshakeBuffer and _internalBuffer in SslStream #64747
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add RegexGenerator to System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter. #62325
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Add support for Windows IO completions to the portable thread pool #64834
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0][wasm] Build improvements #64938
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0][wasm] Remove USE_ZLIB=1 and include the sources instead #64907
    Servicing-consider, area-Build-mono, 6.0.x
  • Make the `EventSource` generator incremental et.al. #64579
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Fix DNS cancellation deadlock #63904
    area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix exceptions on eval #64374
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix mono native warnings from wasm targets #64650
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Unify reading from procfs to get network related information #63696
    area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix Logging source generator failures with various syntax #64779
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Logging
  • Add vectorized paths for Span<T>.Reverse #64412
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Enable regions again. #64688
    * NO MERGE *, area-GC-coreclr
  • PoC TLS resume on Linux client #64369
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.0
  • Optimize `StringBuilder.Insert`. #64922
    community-contribution
  • Keep information about CSE defs on assignment nodes #64896
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NO MERGE] SHM_NAME_MAX #64752
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.IO
  • issue-22928 Add ImmutableArray Span-based APIs #61196
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Improve vectorization of String.Split #64899
    community-contribution
  • First try at implementing newly suggested ctor for providing tighter control over charset #63231
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Move libunwind directories to src/native/external #64043
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][wasm] Allow AOTing methods with catch clauses. #64867
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Fix Issue 62756 Some outer loop tests on Linux fail unless run as root #64619
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, os-linux, community-contribution
  • Move MacCatalyst to runtime-extra-platforms pipeline #64452
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [Android] Workaround for invalid return value from clock_nanosleep #64679
    os-android, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [JIT] More ARM64 comparison instruction optimizations with Vector.Zero #64783
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Do not number partial definitions and `ARGPLACE` nodes #64898
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix too wide memory accesses for nullchecks #64683
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable tests on Debug CoreClr that are already disabled on Checked CoreClr #64891
    area-Meta
  • SPMI no ASMDiff between Checked and Release #61335
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, needs-author-action, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] Add LoongArch64 support in libunwind. #62979
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
